text:
The                                         
  Securities                                  
  and Exchange                                
  Commission                                  
  has not                                     
  necessarily                                 
  reviewed the                                
  information                                 
  in this                                     
  filing and                                  
  has not                                     
  determined                                  
  if it is                                    
  accurate and                                
  complete.                                   
  The reader                                  
  should not                                  
  assume that                                 
  the                                         
  information                                 
  is accurate                                 
  and                                         
  complete.                                   
                UNITED STATES  OMB APPROVAL   
                SECURITIES       OMB Number:  
                AND EXCHANGE   3235-0006      
                COMMISSION         Estimated  
                Washington,    average        
                D.C. 20549     burden         
                FORM 13F           hours per  
                FORM 13F       response:      
                COVER PAGE     23.8           
                                              
The institutional investment manager filing
this report and the person by whom it is
signed hereby represent that the person
signing the report is authorized to submit it,
that all information contained herein is true,
correct and complete, and that it is
understood that all required items,
statements, schedules, lists, and tables, are
considered integral parts of this form.
